OrgName: Cisco Systems, Inc.: human resources data
activities: Cisco human resources data that includes personal information of current and former employees of Cisco and Cisco contingent workers (including temporary workers and other non-empoyees), and of individuals who apply for a job at Cisco, that is obtained by Cisco in the context of the individual's actual or potential working relationship with Cisco.  Human resources data is received by Cisco for the purposes of Cisco: selecting, setting up relationships with, maintaining and administering its workforce; running its operations; and ensuring the safety and protection of its employees, other workers and resources, in the context of Cisco's relationships with those individuals.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
